about_the_game:
DISCLAIMER

The deluxe edition does not include Episode 1 or the contents of the supporter edition.

OVERVIEW


Enjoy more of the College Kings 2 – Episode 1 experience with the Deluxe Edition upgrade! The Deluxe Edition contains:

1. EXCLUSIVE WALLPAPERS OF THE GIRLS
Get 12 different exclusive 4K wallpapers featuring Chloe, Nora, Aubrey, Riley, Lindsey, Lauren, Autumn, Amber, Penelope, Ms. Rose, Samantha and Emily.

2. SEX SCENE GALLERY UNLOCKED
Gain access to a new button inside the scene gallery that allows you to unlock all the sex scenes even when you haven't played through them all in the story.

3. PEEK BEHIND THE CURTAIN
Exclusive behind the scenes videos on a variety of the franchises' most polarizing scenes by the creator Undergrad Steve.

TO ACCESS THIS EXCLUSIVE CONTENT


All exclusive content can be found in the Steam installation directory of the game in the folder: “deluxe_content" (Steam\SteamApps\common\College Kings 2) after the “deluxe_content” DLC has finished downloading.

OR

Right click \"College Kings 2\" in your Steam Library and select \"Properties\". Under the \"Local Files\" tab, select \"Browse Local Files\". Within the local files, locate a folder called \"deluxe_content\."

content_descriptors.notes: The College Kings 2 Act I Deluxe Edition Upgrade contains sexually explicit wallpapers.

detailed_description:
DISCLAIMER

The deluxe edition does not include Episode 1 or the contents of the supporter edition.

OVERVIEW


Enjoy more of the College Kings 2 – Episode 1 experience with the Deluxe Edition upgrade! The Deluxe Edition contains:

1. EXCLUSIVE WALLPAPERS OF THE GIRLS
Get 12 different exclusive 4K wallpapers featuring Chloe, Nora, Aubrey, Riley, Lindsey, Lauren, Autumn, Amber, Penelope, Ms. Rose, Samantha and Emily.

2. SEX SCENE GALLERY UNLOCKED
Gain access to a new button inside the scene gallery that allows you to unlock all the sex scenes even when you haven't played through them all in the story.

3. PEEK BEHIND THE CURTAIN
Exclusive behind the scenes videos on a variety of the franchises' most polarizing scenes by the creator Undergrad Steve.

TO ACCESS THIS EXCLUSIVE CONTENT


All exclusive content can be found in the Steam installation directory of the game in the folder: “deluxe_content" (Steam\SteamApps\common\College Kings 2) after the “deluxe_content” DLC has finished downloading.

OR

Right click \"College Kings 2\" in your Steam Library and select \"Properties\". Under the \"Local Files\" tab, select \"Browse Local Files\". Within the local files, locate a folder called \"deluxe_content\."

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: College Kings 2 - Episode 1 Deluxe Upgrade

package_groups.title: Buy College Kings 2 - Episode 1 Deluxe Upgrade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Enjoy more of the College Kings 2 – Episode 1 experience with the Deluxe Edition upgrade! The Deluxe Edition contains 12 exclusive wallpapers of the girls; all the sex scenes unlocked; and behind the scenes videos of the franchises' most polarizing scenes.
